author: han0110
content: Hey <@402080271563751435>, I'm wondering whether https://github.com/eth-act/lighthouse/tree/feat/eip8025 is ready for use, if not I'd like to ask for review on the PR https://github.com/eth-act/lighthouse/pull/13 base on the old `optional-proofs` branch, which fixes the chain stuck issue and publish the image to ghcr, so we could integrate it temporarily into `ethereum-packages` without using my own fork.

author: taulepton_

author: taulepton_
content: Approved. I think it's fine to merge to unblock integration testing, but I can see why the chain stalls if proofs are not timely. This should hopefully be resolved by `feat/eip8025` branch.
